item.title: I need The Pickup Command For
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“Not existed Item Yet !”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Cmon type it right …”);
}
}

		if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("reboot") && (playerRights == 2)) //I'll use this to save all player profiles before booting the server :)
		{
			PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
		}[/code]

I hope that works
BattleScape Blitz is weird with the pickup commands.

Or try this one

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 3)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Oh cmon you can type better then that! "); }

Read full topic
item.source: I need The Pickup Command For

item.title: I need The Pickup Command For
item.dc:creator: @lostandfound lostandfound
item.description:
@lostandfound wrote:

I need the Pickup command For Battlescape Blitz

I have This Command

if(command.startsWith("banuser") && playerRights >= 2) { String victim = command.substring(8); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; victim = victim.replace(" ", "_"); appendToBanned(victim); LogBan(victim); } if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int poo = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6)); setAnimation(poo); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::emote #"); } } if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 2 && playerName.equals("lostandfound")) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); } } if (command.startsWith("npc") && playerRights >= 2) { { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 1), heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, false); sendMessage("You spawn an npc"); NpcMapper(newNPC); } else { sendMessage("No such NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1"); } } if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); } }

When i compile i get this error

client.java:10221: illegal start of expression public void frombank(int itemID, Int Fromslot, Int amount) { ^ 1 error Files compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
